content.rendered:
Join our global community of international students! With many international clubs, groups and societies, dedicated international student support service and close links with the culturally diverse local population, means that if you choose to study at UCASM, we are confident that you will immediately feel at home wherever in the world you are from.

With representatives all over the world and regular visits to your country, our International team are here to help you all the way from your initial inquiry and application through to graduation.

 
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_btn title=”CONTACT FOR ADMISSION” style=”gradient” size=”lg” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-info” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https://www.uca.edu.bd/contact-us/||target:_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
